metadata.title: Chunk 0: Empty CRM Baseline
metadata.description: Show empty CRM ticket list to establish a clean starting point before the demo

steps.expression: (async () => { try { await fetch('/channel-router/reset', { method: 'POST' }); } catch(e) {} try { const res = await fetch('/trouble-tickets?limit=100'); if (res.ok) { const data = await res.json(); for (const t of (data.tickets || [])) { await fetch('/trouble-tickets/' + t.id, { method: 'DELETE' }); } } } catch(e) {} })()
